nodes.text: Rogue Elements is an adventure in The Kathol Rift, and is part of The DarkStryder Campaign. It is set in 8 ABY.

After rescuing several former inmates of the Q'Maere Research Facility, the FarStar crew starts to become divided amongst the original crew and the new arrivals. Many follow the charismatic leader of the inmates, Lowen Chase, and believe he should be commanding the mission, or at least serve as First Officer. When Captain Kaiya Adrimetrum refuses their demands, they begin to plan a mutiny. Crippled by a lightstorm within the Kathol Rift, the mutineers take control of the ship, seizing several key locations.

The remaining loyal FarStar crew members formulate their own plans to retake the ship, and manage to recover the situation. Realizing that the mutiny stemmed from the inmates attempting to recover from their ordeal at the hands of the staff at Q'Maere, Adrimetrum orders those affected to seek medical treatment, and also places restrictions on their assignments and personal time. Chase, as leader of the group, admits that he is wrong and voluntarily accepts treatment in the medical bay.
